Long before Sima Aunty and dating apps, Tamil Nadu had one matchmaker — ‘Kalyanamalai’ Mohan.
From the rise of television to changing ideas of love and marriage, this OG Tamil matchmaker looks back on his rich 26-year experience of playing Cupid and facilitating over 6.5 lakh weddings. In this Valentine’s Day special interview with The Hindu, Mohan talks about matchmaking, marriage trends, love and how decision making have evolved over decades — from horoscopes to modern expectations.

Woman’s body found in trunk in Bhopal water tank; live-in partner, mother and siblings held
description: In a shocking incident, Bhopal police have arrested a live-in partner and three family members after a woman's decomposed body was discovered in a trunk within a water tank. The accused allegedly murdered the woman, concealed the body at their residence for a day, and then attempted to dispose of it.

India's Varun Chakravarthy, known for his precise lengths and pace, and Pakistan's Abrar Ahmed and Usman Tariq, with their unique variations, are poised to be key figures. Their ability to exploit the conditions could significantly impact the high-stakes encounter.

Bill Gates is reportedly selling the house for which he earlier said 'I like this'
description: Bill Gates has listed a four-bedroom home near his Seattle-area estate for $4.8 million, a move that contrasts with his previous statements about not downsizing. The property, purchased in 1995 for $1 million, is part of a larger portfolio of Medina real estate acquired over decades to ensure privacy around his main Xanadu 2.0 compound.

Mahashivratri 2026: The most sacred items to offer to the Shivalinga
description: Mahashivratri, celebrated on February 15th, 2025, is a significant Hindu festival honoring Lord Shiva. Devotees express gratitude and seek blessings by offering sacred items like Bel Patra, water, Gangajal, sandalwood paste, honey, Dhatura, and white flowers. These offerings are believed to cleanse sins, purify the soul, and bring peace, love, and happiness into one's life.

title: 'Absolutely vile': Candace Owens accuses Erika Kirk of having strange relationship with a 15-year-old girl
description: A viral post has intensified debate over Candace Owens’ use of the term grooming in reference to a 15 year old. Critic Natly Denise accused Owens of exaggerating the situation, while Owens cited details from her own interview describing limited in person contact and online messages. The clash highlights ongoing tensions over how serious terms are defined and used in public commentary.

title: Cisco president Jeetu Patel says company will never hire these developers
description: Cisco's president Jeetu Patel mandates AI for all developers, aiming for half a dozen AI-coded products by 2026. This shift to spec-driven development sees human teams shrink, with AI agents tripling output. While embracing AI's potential, Cisco is investing heavily in security to prevent rogue agents, urging developers to master AI to stay relevant.

title: Patrick Mahomes and Brittany Mahomes make $1M move before season
description: Patrick Mahomes, the Kansas City Chiefs’ star player, is fully focused on recovering from his brutal injuries, after recording a pretty tough time on the field in the last season. As he focuses on his recovery, Patrick Mahomes and his wife, Brittany Mahomes, just pulled off a million dollar move, away from the world of NFL, which has now broken records.

title: After CEO asked employees to stop coding, Nvidia engineers get access to OpenAI's Codex
description: Nvidia has deployed OpenAI's Codex AI coding tool to all 30,000 engineers, marking a significant enterprise rollout. CEO Jensen Huang's mandate to automate tasks with AI is driving this adoption, with engineers praising the tool's ability to handle complex workflows and maintain context.
